sentence.Network_en: If I do not take pity on her, I am a villian.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要是不心疼她, 我就是个恶棍.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 18 反派(Villian) 1  18 爱的主旋律 1  18 针(Needle) 1  18 幸福调味 1  18 爱了没 1  18 乌鲁木齐小女人 1  18 梁山伯与茱丽叶 1  18 最后.

list.abs: 西方的黑白世界... ... days marked with a white stone 幸福的日子 a black villian 大坏蛋，恶棍 black death 黑死病.

auth_sentence.content: Meantime, a perceived villian has emerged in many political races - China.
